api_key.description: The SingleStore Management API key used for authentication. If not provided, the provider will attempt to read the key from the file specified in the 'api_key_path' attribute or from the environment variable 'SINGLESTOREDB_API_KEY'. Generate your API key in the SingleStore Portal at https://portal.singlestore.com/organizations/org-id/api-keys.

api_key_path.description: The absolute path to a file containing the SingleStore Management API key for authentication. If not provided, the provider will use the value in the 'api_key' attribute or the 'SINGLESTOREDB_API_KEY' environment variable. Generate your API key in the SingleStore Portal at https://portal.singlestore.com/organizations/org-id/api-keys.

api_service_url.description: The URL of the SingleStore Management API service. This URL is used by the provider to interact with the API.

block.description: The Terraform provider plugin for managing SingleStoreDB workspace groups and workspaces.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace was created.

endpoint.description: The endpoint used to connect to the workspace.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

kai_enabled.description: Whether the Kai API is enabled for the workspace.

name.description: The name assigned to the workspace.

size.description: The size of the workspace, specified in workspace size notation (S-00, S-0, S-1, S-2).

suspended.description: The status of the workspace. If true, the workspace is suspended.

workspace_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group that the workspace belongs to.

block.description: This resource enables the management of SingleStoreDB workspaces.

admin_password.description: The admin SQL user password for the workspace group. If not provided, the server will automatically generate a secure password. Please note that updates to the admin password might take a brief moment to become effective.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace was created.

expires_at.description: The expiration timestamp of the workspace group. If not specified, the workspace group never expires. Upon expiration, the workspace group is terminated and all its data is lost. Set the expiration time as an RFC3339 UTC timestamp, e.g., "2221-01-02T15:04:05Z".

firewall_ranges.description: List of allowed CIDR ranges. An empty list blocks all inbound requests. For unrestricted traffic, use ["0.0.0.0/0"]. Note that updates to firewall ranges may take a brief moment to become effective.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group.

region_id.description: The unique identifier of the region where the workspace group is to be created.

block.description: Manage SingleStoreDB workspace groups with this resource.

id.description: The unique identifier for the region.

provider.description: The name of the cloud provider hosting the region.

block.description: This data source provides a list of regions that the user can access and that support workspaces. It includes the region ID and provider for each region.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the workspace was initially created.

endpoint.description: The endpoint to connect to the workspace.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

kai_enabled.description: Whether the Kai API is enabled for the workspace.

last_resumed_at.description: The timestamp indicating the most recent time that the workspace was resumed from suspension. If the workspace has never been suspended, this attribute will not be included in the output.

size.description: The size of the workspace, represented in workspace size notation, such as 'S-00' or 'S-1'.

state.description: The current state of the workspace.

suspended.description: A boolean value indicating whether the workspace is currently suspended. If true, the workspace is suspended; if false, the workspace is active.

workspace_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group that the workspace belongs to. This relationship is established when the workspace is created.

block.description: Retrieve a specific workspace using its ID with this data source.

allow_all_traffic.description: Indicates whether all traffic is allowed to reach the workspace group.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace group was created.

expires_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace group will expire. Upon expiration, the workspace group is terminated and all its data is lost.

firewall_ranges.description: A list of the allowed inbound IP address ranges.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group.

name.description: The name of the workspace group.

region_id.description: The unique identifier of the region where the workspace group is located.

state.description: The state of the workspace group.

day.description: The day of the week (0-6), where 0 is Sunday and 6 is Saturday, when the update window is scheduled.

hour.description: The hour of the day, in 24-hour UTC format (0-23), when the update window starts.

update_window.description: Details of the scheduled update window for the workspace group. This is the time period during which any updates to the workspace group will occur.

block.description: Retrieve a specific workspace group using its ID with this data source.

allow_all_traffic.description: Indicates whether all traffic is allowed to reach the workspace group.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace group was created.

expires_at.description: The timestamp when the workspace group will expire. Upon expiration, the workspace group is terminated and all its data is lost.

firewall_ranges.description: A list of the allowed inbound IP address ranges.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group.

name.description: The name of the workspace group.

region_id.description: The unique identifier of the region where the workspace group is located.

state.description: The state of the workspace group.

day.description: The day of the week (0-6), where 0 is Sunday and 6 is Saturday, when the update window is scheduled.

hour.description: The hour of the day, in 24-hour UTC format (0-23), when the update window starts.

update_window.description: Details of the scheduled update window for the workspace group. This is the time period during which any updates to the workspace group will occur.

block.description: This data source provides a list of workspace groups that the user has access to.

workspace_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the workspace was initially created.

endpoint.description: The endpoint to connect to the workspace.

id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

kai_enabled.description: Whether the Kai API is enabled for the workspace.

last_resumed_at.description: The timestamp indicating the most recent time that the workspace was resumed from suspension. If the workspace has never been suspended, this attribute will not be included in the output.

size.description: The size of the workspace, represented in workspace size notation, such as 'S-00' or 'S-1'.

state.description: The current state of the workspace.

suspended.description: A boolean value indicating whether the workspace is currently suspended. If true, the workspace is suspended; if false, the workspace is active.

workspace_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the workspace group that the workspace belongs to. This relationship is established when the workspace is created.

block.description: This data source provides a list of workspaces that the user has access to.
